propertyGroup.name: Outlets
propertyGroup.documentation: Defines the locations to which AndroMDA generates output

property.name: java
property.documentation: The location to which AndroMDA generates the non-editable Java classes

property.name: java_manual
property.documentation: The location to which AndroMDA generates the user-editable Java classes

property.name: test_java
property.documentation: The location to which AndroMDA generates the non-editable Java JUnit test classes

property.name: test_java_manual
property.documentation: The location to which AndroMDA generates the user-editable Java JUnit test classes

property.name: sql
property.documentation: The location to which AndroMDA generates the SQL scripts

property.name: useInterfaceForAssociation
property.documentation: When generating a data member for an association, whether to use the actual type or the interface for the type, permitting the use of lazy loading proxies
